resources.string: We\'re sorry, your account information didn\'t load.\nSwipe down to try again.
Your %1$s loan has been paid in full.
You\'ll find a summary here once your automatic repayments start
Your repayment will be instantly deducted from your available PayPal balance
It can take up to 3 business days to process your final repayment. You can apply for a new loan after this time.
Automatic repayments will continue as usual until your loan is paid in full.
Your account will be updated as soon as the repayment has been processed.
There aren\'t enough funds in your PayPal balance to complete this payment
Enter an amount equal to or less than your PayPal balance.
Something seems to have gone wrong.
A catch-up balance accrues when you withdraw, transfer or spend the proceeds from your sales before automatic repayment occurs.
How do I reduce my catch-up balance\?

We\'ll deduct catch-up payments automatically when new funds become available in your PayPal balance until your catch-up balance has been reduced to $0.\n\nYou can also %1$s to reduce the balance immediately.
To avoid having a catch-up balance, make sure that you always maintain a PayPal balance greater than your daily automatic repayment.\n\nFor more information on catch-up payments, %1$s.
NEW. View and manage your PayPal Working Capital loan
Get a flexible loan to grow your business and manage your cash flow. \n \nApplication, approval and funding take just minutes.
You can customise and accept your offer until %1$s.
Your offer is valid until %1$s.\n\nCustomise and accept your offer, and receive funding in minutes.
We\'ll email you as soon as we\'ve made a decision.
Call us if it doesn\'t appear in your PayPal account within 24 hours.
Enter an amount less than or equal to your remaining loan balance.
